name: $home
desc: An office contact point. First choice for business related contacts during business hours.

name: $work
desc: A temporary contact point. The period can provide more detailed information.

name: $temp
desc: This contact point is no longer in use (or was never correct, but retained for records).

name: $old
desc: A telecommunication device that moves and stays with its owner. May have characteristics of all other use codes, suitable for urgent matters, not the first choice for routine business.
